meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled in managing bureaucratic tasks efficiently and effectively.
meanings.sent1: The superbureaucrat organized the paperwork with great efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The superbureaucrat at the office always finishes tasks ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The superbureaucrat made filing papers look like a fun puzzle.
meanings.sent4: She was a superbureaucrat, turning chaos into order effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The superbureaucrat's ability to streamline processes was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: To perform bureaucratic tasks with exceptional skill and efficiency.
meanings.sent1: He superbureaucrated the forms quickly and accurately.
meanings.sent2: She superbureaucrats every task with precision and speed.
meanings.sent3: I need to superbureaucrat these documents before the deadline!
meanings.sent4: The team superbureaucrated the project, impressing their boss.
meanings.sent5: Watching him superbureaucrat was like witnessing a well-oiled machine in action.
